text: Jacques Bernard "Jacky" Ickx (last name pronounced "Ix" or "Icks") (born 1 January 1945 in Brussels) is a Belgian former racing driver. He had 25 podium finishes in Formula One and six wins in the 24 hours of Le Mans. ==Racing record== ===Complete Formula One World Championship results=== (key) (Races in bold indicate pole position;
